title: Detect Curse
data:
{{Obsolete}}

'''Detect Curse''' was a level 3 [[Divinations]] spell which determined whether or not the items in your [[inventory]] were [[cursed]].

It was found in [[Book of Practical Magic]] and [[Book of Divinations]].

==History==
The Detect Curse spell was removed from the game with the removal of Divinations in [[0.6]], but could be replicated through the use of a [[scroll of detect curse]] until that was also removed in [[0.11]].

[[Category:Divination]]
[[Category:Level 3 Spells]]
